title: 🎯 Complete System Test - The Amazing World of Everything
subtitle: Testing Every Icon, Overlay, and Function
description: This is a comprehensive test lesson that demonstrates every feature of the iLearn system

introduction.title: 🚀 Welcome to the Complete System Test
introduction.text: This lesson will test every single feature of the iLearn system. You'll see avatars switch, overlays open, and all controls working perfectly.
learning_objectives: Verify all overlays work with identifying content

sections.title: 📅 Calendar Test Section
sections.content: Click the calendar icon to test lesson selection. You should see a calendar overlay with 366 days of lessons.
sections.test_instruction: Click 📅 icon → Should open calendar overlay

sections.title: 😊 Tone Test Section
sections.content: Click the tone icon to test voice tone selection. You should see Grandmother, Fun, and Neutral options.
sections.test_instruction: Click 😊 icon → Should open tone overlay

sections.title: 🎭 Avatar Test Section
sections.content: Click the avatar icon to test avatar switching. You should see Ken, Kelly, and You options.
sections.test_instruction: Click 🎭 icon → Should open avatar overlay

sections.title: 🌍 Language Test Section
sections.content: Click the language icon to test language selection. You should see EN, ES, FR, DE, ZH, JA options.
sections.test_instruction: Click 🌍 icon → Should open language overlay

sections.title: 👶 Age Test Section
sections.content: Click the age icon to test age group selection. You should see 10 age groups from 2-102 years.
sections.test_instruction: Click 👶 icon → Should open age overlay

sections.title: ➕ Create Test Section
sections.content: Click the create icon to test lesson creation. You should see a new lesson creator interface.
sections.test_instruction: Click ➕ icon → Should open lesson creator

left_side_buttons.test_instruction: Click left button → Should open calendar
Click left button → Should open creator

quiz_questions.question: Which icon opens the calendar overlay?
quiz_questions.explanation: The calendar icon (📅) opens the lesson calendar overlay.

quiz_questions.question: How many age groups are available?
quiz_questions.explanation: There are 10 age groups from 2-102 years.

quiz_questions.question: Which avatar option represents your own voice?
quiz_questions.explanation: The 'You' option uses your own voice for narration.
